name: UPROOT (itch) (Saara Korhonen, Miikka, kirikoodaa)
description:
Play as grandmas fighting over their precious mushroom gathering spot!

Controls

Use directional keys or WASD to control the grandmas! Green grandma responds to WASD, orange grandma responds to directional keys.

Team Ina Pylkkö Jonna Salomaa Kiri Kälkäjä Miikka Harjuntausta Saara Korhonen

Music: https://www.bensound.com/

Audio SFX: https://www.kenney.nl/
